description: This Java class defines a data transfer object (DTO) named NoteResponse used to encapsulate the response data for a note in the API. It includes fields like id, title, content, createdAt, and updatedAt, with corresponding getters and setters. The class uses Swagger annotations for API documentation.

classes.name: NoteResponse
classes.description: Response payload representing a note returned by the API.

methods.name: getId
methods.description: Returns the unique identifier of the note.

methods.name: setId
methods.description: Sets the unique identifier of the note and returns the NoteResponse instance for chaining.

methods.name: getTitle
methods.description: Returns the title of the note.

methods.name: setTitle
methods.description: Sets the title of the note and returns the NoteResponse instance for chaining.

methods.name: getContent
methods.description: Returns the content of the note.

methods.name: setContent
methods.description: Sets the content of the note and returns the NoteResponse instance for chaining.

methods.name: getCreatedAt
methods.description: Returns the creation timestamp of the note.

methods.name: setCreatedAt
methods.description: Sets the creation timestamp of the note and returns the NoteResponse instance for chaining.

methods.name: getUpdatedAt
methods.description: Returns the last updated timestamp of the note.

methods.name: setUpdatedAt
methods.description: Sets the last updated timestamp of the note and returns the NoteResponse instance for chaining.
